issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Using a setup with 2 NCs, two instances were started sequentially (two separate commands), one of the NC services consumed all memory and crashed.

The logs for the NC at the time of the crash are:

{code}
2012-10-17 11:14:59 DEBUG 000012559 art_implement_tree       | [i-D11A435A] created a blob for an artifact 045|prt-00136ext3-e6b6614a on try 1
2012-10-17 11:14:59  INFO 000012559 copy_creator             | [i-D11A435A] copying/cloning blob prt-00136ext3-e6b6614a to blob 0EKLLYTTQYOBYN7QYEBNT/i-D11A435A/prt-00136ext3-e6b6614a
2012-10-17 11:14:59  INFO 000012559 diskutil_ch              | {1178822400} ch(own|mod) '/dev/mapper/euca-0EKLLYTTQYOBYN7QYEBNT-i-D11A435A-prt-00136ext3-e6b6614a-p0-back' eucalyptus.* 660

"/var/log/messages" contained:

{code}
Oct 17 11:17:03 CENTOS-x86-64 kernel: Out of memory: Kill process 4691 (httpd) score 955 or sacrifice child
Oct 17 11:17:03 CENTOS-x86-64 kernel: Killed process 4691, UID 500, (httpd) total-vm:10592620kB, anon-rss:7598684kB, file-rss:52kB
{code}

As shown in the logs the NC resumed and the instance start up completed successfully.
fields.summary: NC crashed (out of memory) after starting instance

comments.body:
This happened again on my second NC after terminating the instances and starting two more.

I think the below reflects the stack(s) during the crash:

{code}
Thread 3 (Thread 0x7f81b94fb700 (LWP 15072)):
#0  0x00007f81cc2c53bd in nanosleep () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#1  0x00007f81cc2fa574 in usleep () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#2  0x00007f81c7f51e1f in sensor_bottom_half () from /opt/eucalyptus/packages/axis2c-1.6.0/services/EucalyptusNC/libEucalyptusNC.so
#3  0x00007f81c7f5217d in sensor_thread () from /opt/eucalyptus/packages/axis2c-1.6.0/services/EucalyptusNC/libEucalyptusNC.so
#4  0x00007f81cc5b3851 in start_thread () from /lib64/libpthread.so.0
#5  0x00007f81cc30111d in clone () from /lib64/libc.so.6
Thread 2 (Thread 0x7f81adb11700 (LWP 15089)):
#0  0x00007f81cc2c53bd in nanosleep () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#1  0x00007f81cc2c5230 in sleep () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#2  0x00007f81c7f087ea in monitoring_thread () from /opt/eucalyptus/packages/axis2c-1.6.0/services/EucalyptusNC/libEucalyptusNC.so
#3  0x00007f81cc5b3851 in start_thread () from /lib64/libpthread.so.0
#4  0x00007f81cc30111d in clone () from /lib64/libc.so.6
Thread 1 (Thread 0x7f81cdcc87e0 (LWP 15071)):
#0  0x00007f81cc26e2e1 in _IO_vfscanf_internal () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#1  0x00007f81cc282285 in vsscanf () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#2  0x00007f81cc27c4f8 in sscanf () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#3  0x00007f81cc2b6089 in __tzset_parse_tz () from /lib64/libc.so.6
